Path: README.md 1 ![小明日香真可爱啊啊啊啊啊啊](simple.jpg) 2 3 # 「One Last Image」卢浮宫生成器 4 5 One Last Image 卢浮宫生成器 是一个 将 **赛璐珞风格** **动画截图** 或 **插画**，转换成 One Last Kiss 封面风格的在线生成器 6 7 ## 地址 8 https://lab.magiconch.com/one-last-image/ 9 10 11 ## 功能 12 在转换时，可以自定义 13 - 线条处理方案 14 - 开关 One Last Kiss 风格（仅将图片转换为线稿） 15 - 给画面暗部排铅笔调子 16 - 叠加类似 One Last Kiss 光碟封面水印 17 - 初回限定盘面效果选项 18 - 线迹轻重 19 - 调子数量 20 - 叠加歌词 （未完成） 21 22 点按图片可以和原图对比生成效果，也可以直接输出对比图 23 24 手机端请使用自带浏览器进行保存 25 26 27 ## GitHub 28 https://github.com/itorr/one-last-image 29 30 ## 微博 31 https://weibo.com/1197780522/M19X18EGP 32 33 ## 使用了 34 ITC Avant Garde Gothic Bold [#3](https://github.com/itorr/one-last-image/issues/3)... IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "nuxt-app/utils/louvre.ts", "file_content": "/**\n * @author itorr\n * @date 2022-06-01\n * @Description One Last Image - \u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u6838\u5fc3\u6a21\u5757\n */\n\n// \u5377\u79ef\u6838\u5b9a\u4e49\nconst createConvoluteAverage = (w: number) => new Array(w * w).fill(1 / (w * w))\n\nexport const Convolutes = {\n '\u7cbe\u7ec6': createConvoluteAverage(5),\n '\u4e00\u822c': createConvoluteAverage(7),\n '\u7a0d\u7c97': createConvoluteAverage(9),\n '\u8d85\u7c97': createConvoluteAverage(11),\n '\u6781\u7c97': createConvoluteAverage(13),\n '\u6d6e\u96d5': [\n 1, 1, 1,\n 1, 1, -1,\n -1, -1, -1\n ],\n '\u7ebf\u7a3f': null,\n}\n\n// \u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u914d\u7f6e\u63a5\u53e3\nexport interface LouvreConfig {\n zoom?: number\n light?: number\n shadeLimit?: number\n shadeLight?: number\n shade?: boolean\n kuma?: boolean\n hajimei?: boolean\n watermark?: boolean\n convoluteName?: string\n convolute1Diff?: boolean\n convoluteName2?: string | null\n lightCut?: number\n darkCut?: number\n denoise?: boolean\n Convolutes?: typeof Convolutes\n}\n\n// \u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u53c2\u6570\u63a5\u53e3\nexport interface LouvreParams {\n img: HTMLImageElement\n outputCanvas: HTMLCanvasElement\n config: LouvreConfig\n}\n\nlet watermarkImageEl: HTMLImageElement | null = null\nlet pencilTextureEl: HTMLImageElement | null = null\nlet lastConfigString: string | null = null\n\n// \u52a0\u8f7d\u56fe\u50cf\u8d44\u6e90\nconst loadImage = (url: string): Promise => {\n return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n const el = new Image()\n el.onload = () => resolve(el)\n el.onerror = reject\n el.src = url\n })\n}\n\n// \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u8d44\u6e90\nexport const louvreInit = async (): Promise => {\n try {\n pencilTextureEl = await loadImage('/pencil-texture.jpg')\n watermarkImageEl = await loadImage('/one-last-image-logo2.png')\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('Failed to load resources:', error)\n }\n}\n\n// \u5377\u79ef\u8fd0\u7b97\nconst convolute = (pixels: ImageData, weights: number[], ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D): ImageData => {\n const side = Math.round(Math.sqrt(weights.length))\n const halfSide = Math.floor(side / 2)\n const src = pixels.data\n const sw = pixels.width\n const sh = pixels.height\n const w = sw\n const h = sh\n const output = ctx.createImageData(w, h)\n const dst = output.data\n\n for (let y = 0; y < h; y++) {\n for (let x = 0; x < w; x++) {\n const sy = y\n const sx = x\n const dstOff = (y * w + x) * 4\n let r = 0, g = 0, b = 0, a = 0\n\n for (let cy = 0; cy < side; cy++) {\n for (let cx = 0; cx < side; cx++) {\n const scy = sy + cy - halfSide\n const scx = sx + cx - halfSide\n\n if (scy >= 0 && scy < sh && scx >= 0 && scx < sw) {\n const srcOff = (scy * sw + scx) * 4\n const wt = weights[cy * side + cx]\n r += src[srcOff] * wt\n g += src[srcOff + 1] * wt\n b += src[srcOff + 2] * wt\n a += src[srcOff + 3] * wt\n }\n }\n }\n\n dst[dstOff] = r\n dst[dstOff + 1] = g\n dst[dstOff + 2] = b\n dst[dstOff + 3] = a\n }\n }\n\n return output\n}\n\n// Y\u901a\u9053\u5377\u79ef\nconst convoluteY = (pixels: ImageData, weights: number[], ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D): ImageData => {\n const side = Math.round(Math.sqrt(weights.length))\n const halfSide = Math.floor(side / 2)\n const src = pixels.data\n const sw = pixels.width\n const sh = pixels.height\n const w = sw\n const h = sh\n const output = ctx.createImageData(w, h)\n const dst = output.data\n\n for (let y = 0; y < h; y++) {\n for (let x = 0; x < w; x++) {\n const sy = y\n const sx = x\n const dstOff = (y * w + x) * 4\n let val = 0\n\n for (let cy = 0; cy < side; cy++) {\n for (let cx = 0; cx < side; cx++) {\n const scy = sy + cy - halfSide\n const scx = sx + cx - halfSide\n\n if (scy >= 0 && scy < sh && scx >= 0 && scx < sw) {\n const srcOff = (scy * sw + scx) * 4\n const wt = weights[cy * side + cx]\n val += src[srcOff] * wt\n }\n }\n }\n\n dst[dstOff] = val\n dst[dstOff + 1] = val\n dst[dstOff + 2] = val\n dst[dstOff + 3] = 255\n }\n }\n\n return output\n}\n\n// \u4e3b\u8981\u7684\u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570\nexport const louvre = async ({ img, outputCanvas, config }: LouvreParams): Promise => {\n if (!img || !config) return\n\n console.time('louvre')\n\n const configString = [\n JSON.stringify(config),\n img.src,\n ].join('-')\n\n if (configString === lastConfigString) {\n console.timeEnd('louvre')\n return\n }\n lastConfigString = configString\n\n const canvas = document.createElement('canvas')\n const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d')!\n const canvasMin = document.createElement('canvas')\n\n const { naturalWidth, naturalHeight } = img\n let _width = naturalWidth\n let _height = naturalHeight\n\n // \u9650\u5236\u6700\u5927\u5c3a\u5bf8\n const maxSize = \u66f4\u65b0\u4f9d\u8d56\u5305\n\n\u5728\u4e3b\u9879\u76ee\u4e2d\u5b89\u88c5\u4ee5\u4e0b\u4f9d\u8d56\uff1a\n\n```bash\n# \u5982\u679c\u8fd8\u6ca1\u6709\u5b89\u88c5\u8fd9\u4e9b\u4f9d\u8d56\npnpm add vuetify-nuxt-module @nuxtjs/sitemap @pinia/nuxt pinia-plugin-persistedstate\n```\n\n### 2. \u66f4\u65b0 nuxt.config.ts\n\n\u6211\u5df2\u7ecf\u66f4\u65b0\u4e86 `nuxt-app/nuxt.config.ts` \u6587\u4ef6\u4ee5\u5339\u914d\u60a8\u7684\u4e3b\u9879\u76ee\u914d\u7f6e\uff1a\n\n```typescript\n// https://nuxt.com/docs/api/configuration/nuxt-config\nexport default defineNuxtConfig({\n compatibilityDate: '2025-04-01',\n devtools: { enabled: true },\n \n modules: [\n 'vuetify-nuxt-module',\n '@nuxtjs/sitemap',\n '@pinia/nuxt',\n 'pinia-plugin-persistedstate/nuxt',\n ],\n \n site: {\n url: 'https://www.color-page.com',\n name: 'Free Coloring Page | Stroke',\n },\n \n sitemap: {\n urls: async () => {\n const sitemap = await fetch(`https://api.color-page.com/api/sitemap/get-additional-sitemap`, {\n method: 'GET'\n })\n const sitemapData = await sitemap.json()\n return sitemapData\n }\n },\n \n imports: {\n dirs: [\n 'composables', \n 'datas'\n ],\n },\n \n components: true,\n \n vuetify: {\n moduleOptions: {},\n vuetifyOptions: {},\n },\n \n features: {\n inlineStyles: false\n },\n \n ssr: true,\n nitro: {\n preset: 'cloudflare',\n prerender: {\n autoSubfolderIndex: false\n }\n },\n \n app: {\n head: {\n title: 'One Last Image - \u5362\u6d6e\u5bab\u751f\u6210\u5668',\n meta: [\n { charset: 'utf-8' },\n { name: 'viewport', content: 'width=device-width, initial-scale=1' },\n { name: 'description', content: 'One Last Kiss \u5362\u6d6e\u5bab\u751f\u6210\u5668 \u98ce\u683c \u56fe\u7247\u8f6c\u7ebf\u7a3f \u5c01\u9762\u751f\u6210 \u5b87\u591a\u7530\u5149 \u795e\u5947\u6d77\u87ba\u5b9e\u9a8c\u5ba4' },\n { name: 'apple-mobile-web-app-capable', content: 'yes' },\n { name: 'apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style', content: 'black-translucent' },\n ],\n link: [\n { rel: 'manifest', href: '/manifest.json' },\n { rel: 'apple-touch-icon', href: '/favicon.ico' },\n { rel: 'icon', type: 'image/x-icon', href: '/favicon.ico' }\n ],\n },\n },\n})\n```\n\n### 3. \u79fb\u9664\u65e7\u7684 Vuetify \u63d2\u4ef6\n\n\u5220\u9664 `plugins/vuetify.ts` \u6587\u4ef6\uff0c\u56e0\u4e3a number\n shade: boolean\n kuma: boolean\n hajimei: boolean\n watermark: boolean\n convoluteName: string\n convolute1Diff: boolean\n convoluteName2: string | null\n lightCut: number\n darkCut: number\n denoise: boolean\n}\n\nexport const useOneLastImageStore = defineStore('oneLastImage', {\n state: () => ({\n // \u56fe\u50cf\u76f8\u5173\n currentImageSrc: 'images/asuka-8.jpg',\n defaultImageURL: 'images/asuka-8.jpg',\n outputImage: '',\n downloadFilename: '[One-Last-Image].jpg',\n \n // \u5c3a\u5bf8\u76f8\u5173\n previewWidth: 800,\n previewHeight: 474,\n \n // \u72b6\u6001\u76f8\u5173\n loading: true,\n processing: false,\n showDiff: false,\n showOutput: false,\n \n // \u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u8bbe\u7f6e\n settings: {\n zoom: 1,\n light: 0,\n shadeLimit: 108,\n shadeLight: 80,\n shade: true,\n kuma: true,\n hajimei: false,\n watermark: true,\n convoluteName: '\u4e00\u822c',\n convolute1Diff: true,\n convoluteName2: null,\n lightCut: 128,\n darkCut: 118,\n denoise: true,\n } as ImageSettings,\n \n // \u5377\u79ef\u6838\u9009\u9879\n convolutes: ['\u7cbe\u7ec6', '\u4e00\u822c', '\u7a0d\u7c97', '\u8d85\u7c97', '\u6781\u7c97', '\u6d6e\u96d5', '\u7ebf\u7a3f'],\n selectedConvoluteIndex: 1, // \u9ed8\u8ba4\u9009\u62e9\"\u4e00\u822c\"\n \n // \u6b4c\u8bcd\u76f8\u5173\n lyrics: [] as any[],\n lyricIndex: 0,\n \n // \u659c\u5207\u4f4d\u7f6e\n bevelPosition: 20,\n \n // \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u72b6\u6001\n initialized: false,\n }),\n\n getters: {\n isDefaultImage: (state) => state.currentImageSrc !== state.defaultImageURL,\n \n sizeStyle: (state) => ({\n width: `${state.previewWidth}px`,\n height: `${state.previewHeight}px`,\n }),\n },\n\n actions: {\n // \u521d\u59cb\u5316\n async initialize() {\n if (this.initialized) return\n \n try {\n await louvreInit()\n this.initialized = true\n \n // \u6a21\u62df\u52a0\u8f7d\n setTimeout(() => {\n this.loading = false\n }, 2000)\n \n // \u52a0\u8f7d\u6b4c\u8bcd\n await this.loadLyrics()\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n this.loading = false\n }\n },\n\n // \u8bbe\u7f6e\u56fe\u7247\u6e90\n setImageSrc(src: string) {\n this.currentImageSrc = src\n },\n\n // \u8bfb\u53d6\u6587\u4ef6\u5e76\u8bbe\u7f6e\u56fe\u7247\u6e90\n readFileAndSetImageSrc(file: File) {\n const reader = new FileReader()\n reader.onload = () => {\n this.currentImageSrc = reader.result as string\n }\n reader.readAsDataURL(file)\n },\n\n // \u8bbe\u7f6e\u56fe\u7247\u5c3a\u5bf8\n setImageDimensions(width: number, height: number) {\n this.previewWidth = width\n this.previewHeight = height\n },\n\n // \u66f4\u65b0\u8bbe\u7f6e\n updateSetting(key: K, value: ImageSettings[K]) {\n this.settings[key] = value\n },\n\n // \u8bbe\u7f6e\u5377\u79ef\u6838\n setConvolute(name: string, index: number) {\n this.settings.convoluteName = name\n this.selectedConvoluteIndex = index\n },\n\n // \u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\n async processImage(imgElement: HTMLImageElement, canvasElement: HTMLCanvasElement) {\n this.processing = true\n \n try {\n await louvre({\n img: imgElement,\n outputCanvas: canvasElement,\n config: {\n ...this.settings,\n Convolutes,\n } as LouvreConfig\n })\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u56fe\u50cf\u5904\u7406\u5931\u8d25:', error)\n } finally {\n this.processing = false\n }\n },\n\n // \u4fdd\u5b58\u56fe\u7247\n saveImage(canvas: HTMLCanvasElement) {\n this.outputImage = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0.9)\n this.downloadFilename = `[lab.magiconch.com][One-Last-Image]-${Date.now()}.jpg`\n this.showOutput = true\n return this.outputImage\n },\n\n // \u4fdd\u5b58\u5bf9\u6bd4\u56fe\n saveDiffImage(imgElement: HTMLImageElement, canvasElement: HTMLCanvasElement) {\n const mixCanvas = document.createElement('canvas')\n const mixCanvasCtx = mixCanvas.getContext('2d')!\n mixCanvas.width = canvasElement.width\n mixCanvas.height = canvasElement.height * 2\n\n mixCanvasCtx.drawImage(canvasElement, 0, 0, canvasElement.width, canvasElement.height)\n mixCanvasCtx.drawImage(\n imgElement,\n 0, 0, imgElement.naturalWidth, imgElement.naturalHeight,\n 0, canvasElement.height, canvasElement.width, canvasElement.height\n )\n\n this.outputImage = mixCanvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0.9)\n this.downloadFilename = `[lab.magiconch.com][One-Last-Image]-diff-${Date.now()}.jpg`\n this.showOutput = true\n return this.outputImage\n },\n\n // \u4fdd\u5b58\u659c\u5207\u5bf9\u6bd4\u56fe\n saveBevelDiffImage(imgElement: HTMLImageElement, canvasElement: HTMLCanvasElement) {\n const mixCanvas = document.createElement('canvas')\n const mixCanvasCtx = mixCanvas.getContext('2d')!\n mixCanvas.width = canvasElement.width\n mixCanvas.height = canvasElement.height\n\n mixCanvasCtx.drawImage(canvasElement, 0, 0, canvasElement.width, canvasElement.height)\n\n const topXScale = this.bevelPosition / 100 + 0.24\n const bottomXScale = this.bevelPosition / 100 + 0.04\n const topX = Math.floor(canvasElement.width * topXScale)\n const bottomX = Math.floor(canvasElement.width * bottomXScale)\n\n mixCanvasCtx.beginPath()\n mixCanvasCtx.moveTo(0, 0)\n mixCanvasCtx.lineTo(topX, 0)\n mixCanvasCtx.lineTo(bottomX, canvasElement.height)\n mixCanvasCtx.lineTo(0, canvasElement.height)\n mixCanvasCtx.closePath()\n\n const pattern = mixCanvasCtx.createPattern(imgElement, 'no-repeat')!\n mixCanvasCtx.fillStyle = pattern\n mixCanvasCtx.fill()\n\n this.outputImage = mixCanvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg', 0.9)\n this.downloadFilename = `[lab.magiconch.com][One-Last-Image]-diff2-${Date.now()}.jpg`\n \n if (!this.showOutput) {\n this.showOutput = true\n }\n \n return this.outputImage\n },\n\n // \u5173\u95ed\u8f93\u51fa\u5bf9\u8bdd\u6846\n closeOutput() {\n this.showOutput = false\n this.outputImage = ''\n },\n\n // \u52a0\u8f7d\u6b4c\u8bcd\n async loadLyrics() {\n try {\n const response = await fetch('/one-last-kiss.lrc')\n const lrcText = await response.text()\n // \u8fd9\u91cc\u9700\u8981\u5bfc\u5165\u6b4c\u8bcd\u89e3\u6790\u51fd\u6570\n // this.lyrics = parseLyrics(lrcText)\n \n // \u542f\u52a8\u6b4c\u8bcd\u540c\u6b65\uff08\u5982\u679c\u6709\u6b4c\u8bcd\uff09\n if (this.lyrics.length > 0) {\n const lastLyric = this.lyrics[this.lyrics.length - 1]\n const duration = lastLyric.time\n \n const updateLyric = () => {\n const now = Date.now() / 1000\n const currentTime = now % duration\n // this.lyricIndex = getCurrentLyricIndex(this.lyrics,
